md:
giải nghĩa từ "tidy" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Tidy (adjective)
	+ Meaning: clean, neat, and organized
	+ Example sentence: "She keeps her room tidy and always makes her bed."
	+ Related words: clean, neat, organized, messy, cluttered

* Tidy (verb)
	+ Meaning: to make something clean and organized
	+ Example sentence: "I need to tidy up the living room before the guests arrive."
	+ Related words: clean, organize, arrange, declutter, straighten

* Tidy (noun)
	+ Meaning: a state of being clean and organized
	+ Example sentence: "The tidy condition of the house impressed the visitors."
	+ Related words: cleanliness, organization, neatness, order, mess

Note: The word "tidy" can have different meanings and uses depending on the context. The above explanations are just some of the common meanings and uses of the word.
